item.description:
We've got a solid date for our April Meetup! Details to come, but mark your calendars and RSVP now!

This month's technique will be using alcohol inks.  If you've never used them, you will be amazed at the beautiful results that can be achieved. Jinnie will demonstrate the techniques and then we will each make alcohol ink backgrounds.  The backgrounds will then be used in a jam session so that you'll all go home with a lovely example of how they can be used. The jam session will be optional if you can't bear to part with the backgrounds you've made.

If you have alcohol inks, glossy paper and/or tools, please bring them, but we will have plenty to share.
item.how_to_find_us: Details are in pre-Meetup e-mail sent to everyone who's RSVP'd "yes" and on Message Board

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: NE ATC+ April 2011 Meetup
